means: 缺乏时代性的，落后于潮流的

sentence.Network_en: The government decided that their testimony would be irrelevant to the case.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府认定他们的证词与案件不相关。

sentence.Network_en: This involved the deletion of a great deal of irrelevant material.
sentence.Network_cn: 这包括删除很大一部分不相关的内容。

sentence.Network_en: A lot of nit-picking was going on about irrelevant things.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于毫不相干的事情进行大量吹毛求疵的批评。

list.abs: 环境变量(environmental variable)无关变量(irrelevant variable)对变量进行分类(5)
irrelevancy =irrelevanceirrelevant information 不需要信息；干扰irreplaceable 不能替换的
irrelative 无关系的irrelevant cue 无关连线索irrelevant data 无关资料
irrelevant data 无关资料irrelevant dimension 无关连维度irrelevant drive 多余驱力

entry.def: If you describe something such as a fact or remark as irrelevant, you mean that it is not connected with what you are discussing or dealing with.

example.ex: The government decided that their testimony would be irrelevant to the case.
example.tran: 政府认定他们的证词与案件不相关。

entry.def: If you say that something is irrelevant, you mean that it is not important in a situation.

example.ex: Their old hard-won skills were irrelevant...
example.tran: 他们以往辛苦学得的技能没什么大用处。

example.ex: The choice of subject matter is irrelevant...

means.word_mean: 1. having no bearing on or connection with the subject at issue;

auth_sentence.content: Precognition is irrelevant to the right now, though.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Precognition is irrelevant to the right now, though.

auth_sentence.res_content: On the other hand, it could be irrelevant.

auth_sentence.content: What he did in his spare time is irrelevant.
auth_sentence.res_content: What he did in his spare time is irrelevant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What he did in his spare time is irrelevant.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不相干的,离题的,与……不相干
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+relevant[adj.有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的]→adj.不相干的,离题的,与……不相干

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+lev举起,变轻+ant……的→再举起→有关的
elevate[v.举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位]+or器→n.电梯,升降机
lev举起,变轻+er表名词→举起[重东西]的东西
lever[n.杆,杠杆,手段,途径,工具]+age状态→n.杠杆作用
lev举起,变轻+ity表名词→n.轻率,轻浮
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax
al一再+lev举起,变轻+iate表动词→不断轻→减轻

stems_affixes.value_cn: 举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+lev举起,变轻+ate表动词→举出→升高
lev举起,变轻+it+ate表动词→使东西举起→升到空中
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax

sentences.en: Ludicrously irrelevant thoughts swarmed in her head.
sentences.cn: 一些毫无干系的荒唐想法在她的脑海里湧动。

sentences.en: It was all irrelevant, but I didn’t dare interrupt him in midflow.
sentences.cn: 他说的事情全都不相关，但我还是不敢中途打断他。

sentences.en: Her statement is irrelevant to this case.
sentences.cn: 她的陈述与这件事无关。
